mapper.insert: INSERT INTO move_req ( move_req_cd, move_type, move_rea, move_status, requ, req_dt, note ) VALUES ( #{moveReqCd}, #{moveType}, #{moveRea}, #{moveStatus}, #{requ}, #{reqDt}, #{note} )

INSERT INTO move_req_d ( mrdcode, move_req_cd, mcode, mate_ver_cd, pcode, prod_ver_cd, item_type, lot_no, move_qty, unit, depa_ware_cd, depa_area_cd, arr_ware_cd, arr_area_cd ) VALUES ( #{mrdcode}, #{moveReqCd}, #{mcode}, #{mateVerCd}, #{pcode}, #{prodVerCd}, #{itemType}, #{lotNo}, #{moveQty}, #{unit}, #{depaWareCd}, #{depaAreaCd}, #{arrWareCd}, #{arrAreaCd} )
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(move_req_cd, -3))), 0) as last_seq FROM move_req WHERE move_req_cd LIKE 'MR-' || #{datePattern} || '-%'
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(mrdcode, -3))), 0) as last_seq FROM move_req_d WHERE mrdcode LIKE 'MRD-' || #{datePattern} || '-%'
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ware_move_cd, -3))), 0) as last_seq FROM ware_move_his WHERE ware_move_cd LIKE 'WMH-' || #{datePattern} || '-%'

SELECT mr.move_req_cd, mr.move_type, mr.move_rea, mr.move_status, mr.requ, mr.req_dt, mr.appr, mr.app_dt, mr.retu_rea, mr.note, e1.emp_name as requ_name, e2.emp_name as appr_name, CASE mr.move_type WHEN 'z1' THEN '내부이동' WHEN 'z2' THEN '외부이동' ELSE mr.move_type END as move_type_text, CASE mr.move_status WHEN 'd1' THEN '요청' WHEN 'd2' THEN '승인' WHEN 'd3' THEN '거절' ELSE mr.move_status END as move_status_text FROM move_req mr LEFT JOIN employee e1 ON mr.requ = e1.emp_cd LEFT JOIN employee e2 ON mr.appr = e2.emp_cd WHERE mr.move_status = 'd1' ORDER BY mr.req_dt DESC, mr.move_req_cd DESC

SELECT mr.move_req_cd, mr.move_type, mr.move_rea, mr.move_status, mr.requ, mr.req_dt, mr.appr, mr.app_dt, mr.retu_rea, mr.note FROM move_req mr WHERE 1=1
AND mr.move_req_cd LIKE '%' || #{moveReqCd} || '%'
AND mr.requ = #{requ}
AND mr.move_status = #{moveStatus}
AND mr.req_dt >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND mr.req_dt <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
ORDER BY mr.req_dt DESC, mr.move_req_cd DESC

SELECT mr.move_req_cd, mr.move_type, mr.move_rea, mr.move_status, mr.requ, mr.req_dt, mr.appr, mr.app_dt, mr.retu_rea, mr.note, e1.emp_name as requ_name, e2.emp_name as appr_name, CASE mr.move_type WHEN 'z1' THEN '내부이동' WHEN 'z2' THEN '외부이동' ELSE mr.move_type END as move_type_text, CASE mr.move_status WHEN 'd1' THEN '요청' WHEN 'd2' THEN '승인' WHEN 'd3' THEN '거절' ELSE mr.move_status END as move_status_text FROM move_req mr LEFT JOIN employee e1 ON mr.requ = e1.emp_cd LEFT JOIN employee e2 ON mr.appr = e2.emp_cd WHERE mr.move_req_cd = #{moveReqCd}

SELECT mrd.mrdcode, mrd.move_req_cd, mrd.mcode, mrd.mate_ver_cd, mrd.pcode, mrd.prod_ver_cd, mrd.item_type, mrd.lot_no, mrd.move_qty, mrd.unit, mrd.depa_ware_cd, mrd.depa_area_cd, mrd.arr_ware_cd, mrd.arr_area_cd, -- 자재/제품 정보 COALESCE(m.mate_name, p.prod_name) as item_name, COALESCE(m.mate_name, p.prod_name) as mate_name, COALESCE(mrd.mcode, mrd.pcode) as item_code, -- 출발위치 정보 df.fac_name as depa_fac_name, dw.ware_name as depa_ware_name, dwd.area_row || '-' || dwd.area_col || '-' || dwd.area_floor as depa_area_name, df.fac_name || '-' || dw.ware_name || '-' || dwd.area_row || '-' || dwd.area_col || '-' || dwd.area_floor as depa_location, -- 도착위치 정보 af.fac_name as arr_fac_name, aw.ware_name as arr_ware_name, awd.area_row || '-' || awd.area_col || '-' || awd.area_floor as arr_area_name, af.fac_name || '-' || aw.ware_name || '-' || awd.area_row || '-' || awd.area_col || '-' || awd.area_floor as arr_location FROM move_req_d mrd -- 자재 정보 조인 LEFT JOIN material m ON mrd.mcode = m.mcode AND mrd.mate_ver_cd = m.mate_ver_cd -- 제품 정보 조인 LEFT JOIN product p ON mrd.pcode = p.pcode AND mrd.prod_ver_cd = p.prod_ver_cd -- 출발지 정보 조인 LEFT JOIN ware_d dwd ON mrd.depa_area_cd = dwd.ware_area_cd LEFT JOIN warehouse dw ON dwd.wcode = dw.wcode AND dwd.ware_ver_cd = dw.ware_ver_cd LEFT JOIN factory df ON dw.fcode = df.fcode AND dw.fac_ver_cd = df.fac_ver_cd -- 도착지 정보 조인 LEFT JOIN ware_d awd ON mrd.arr_area_cd = awd.ware_area_cd LEFT JOIN warehouse aw ON awd.wcode = aw.wcode AND awd.ware_ver_cd = aw.ware_ver_cd LEFT JOIN factory af ON aw.fcode = af.fcode AND aw.fac_ver_cd = af.fac_ver_cd WHERE mrd.move_req_cd = #{moveReqCd} ORDER BY mrd.mrdcode

SELECT DISTINCT mi.mcode, mi.mate_ver_cd, m.mate_name, m.mate_type, m.sto_con, mi.lot_no, ws.qty, ws.unit, ws.ware_area_cd, wd.area_row, wd.area_col, wd.area_floor, w.wcode, w.ware_name, f.fcode, f.fac_name FROM ware_stock ws INNER JOIN mate_inbo mi ON ws.mate_inbo_cd = mi.mate_inbo_cd INNER JOIN material m ON mi.mcode = m.mcode AND mi.mate_ver_cd = m.mate_ver_cd INNER JOIN ware_d wd ON ws.ware_area_cd = wd.ware_area_cd INNER JOIN warehouse w ON wd.wcode = w.wcode AND wd.ware_ver_cd = w.ware_ver_cd INNER JOIN factory f ON w.fcode = f.fcode AND w.fac_ver_cd = f.fac_ver_cd WHERE f.fcode = #{fcode} AND ws.qty > 0 AND m.is_used = 'f1' ORDER BY m.mate_name, mi.lot_no

choose.when: SELECT ws.wslcode, ws.ware_area_cd, ws.qty as current_stock, ws.unit, wd.area_row, wd.area_col, wd.area_floor, w.ware_name, f.fac_name, mi.lot_no, mi.mcode, mi.mate_ver_cd, m.mate_name as item_name FROM ware_stock ws INNER JOIN ware_d wd ON ws.ware_area_cd = wd.ware_area_cd INNER JOIN warehouse w ON wd.wcode = w.wcode AND wd.ware_ver_cd = w.ware_ver_cd INNER JOIN factory f ON w.fcode = f.fcode AND w.fac_ver_cd = f.fac_ver_cd INNER JOIN mate_inbo mi ON ws.mate_inbo_cd = mi.mate_inbo_cd INNER JOIN material m ON mi.mcode = m.mcode AND mi.mate_ver_cd = m.mate_ver_cd WHERE mi.mcode = #{itemCode} AND mi.lot_no = #{lotNo} AND ws.qty > 0
choose.otherwise: SELECT ws.wslcode, ws.ware_area_cd, ws.qty as current_stock, ws.unit, wd.area_row, wd.area_col, wd.area_floor, w.ware_name, f.fac_name, pi.lot_no, pi.pcode, pi.prod_ver_cd, p.prod_name as item_name FROM ware_stock ws INNER JOIN ware_d wd ON ws.ware_area_cd = wd.ware_area_cd INNER JOIN warehouse w ON wd.wcode = w.wcode AND wd.ware_ver_cd = w.ware_ver_cd INNER JOIN factory f ON w.fcode = f.fcode AND w.fac_ver_cd = f.fac_ver_cd INNER JOIN prod_inbo pi ON ws.prod_inbo_cd = pi.prod_inbo_cd INNER JOIN product p ON pi.pcode = p.pcode AND pi.prod_ver_cd = p.prod_ver_cd WHERE pi.pcode = #{itemCode} AND pi.lot_no = #{lotNo} AND ws.qty > 0

mapper.select: SELECT f.fcode, f.fac_ver_cd, f.fac_name, f.address, f.tel, f.mname, f.op_status FROM factory f WHERE f.op_status = 'r1' ORDER BY f.fac_name ASC

SELECT w.wcode, w.ware_ver_cd, w.ware_name, w.ware_type, w.address, w.max_row, w.max_col, w.max_floor, w.fcode, w.fac_ver_cd FROM warehouse w WHERE w.fcode = #{fcode} AND w.is_used = 'f1' ORDER BY w.ware_type ASC, w.ware_name ASC

SELECT wd.ware_area_cd, wd.area_row, wd.area_col, wd.area_floor, wd.vol, wd.wcode, wd.ware_ver_cd, COALESCE(stock_sum.current_volume, 0) as current_volume FROM ware_d wd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ware_area_cd, SUM(qty) as current_volume FROM ware_stock GROUP BY ware_area_cd ) stock_sum ON wd.ware_area_cd = stock_sum.ware_area_cd WHERE wd.wcode = #{wcode} AND wd.is_used = 'f1' ORDER BY wd.area_floor ASC, wd.area_row ASC, wd.area_col ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ware_move_his ( ware_move_cd, mcode, mate_ver_cd, pcode, prod_ver_cd, lot_no, move_qty, depa_ware_cd, depa_area_cd, arr_ware_cd, arr_area_cd, move_dt, move_rea, mname, reg_dt, mrdcode ) VALUES ( #{wareMoveCd}, #{mcode}, #{mateVerCd}, #{pcode}, #{prodVerCd}, #{lotNo}, #{moveQty}, #{depaWareCd}, #{depaAreaCd}, #{arrWareCd}, #{arrAreaCd}, #{moveDt}, #{moveRea}, #{mname}, #{regDt}, #{mrdcode} )

choose.when: MERGE INTO ware_stock ws USING ( SELECT mi.mate_inbo_cd, #{arrAreaCd} as ware_area_cd, #{moveQty} as move_qty, #{mname} as mname FROM mate_inbo mi WHERE mi.mcode = #{mcode} AND mi.mate_ver_cd = #{mateVerCd} AND mi.lot_no = #{lotNo} ) src ON (ws.mate_inbo_cd = src.mate_inbo_cd AND ws.ware_area_cd = src.ware_area_cd) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET qty = qty + src.move_qty WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( wslcode, mate_inbo_cd, ware_area_cd, qty, regi, inbo_dt, unit, item_type ) VALUES ( 'WStock-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD((SELECT NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(wslcode, -3)), 0) + 1 FROM ware_stock WHERE wslcode LIKE 'WStock-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || '-%'), 3, '0'), src.mate_inbo_cd, src.ware_area_cd, src.move_qty, src.mname, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{unit}, #{itemType} )

MERGE INTO ware_stock ws USING ( SELECT pi.prod_inbo_cd, #{arrAreaCd} as ware_area_cd, #{moveQty} as move_qty, #{mname} as mname FROM prod_inbo pi WHERE pi.pcode = #{pcode} AND pi.prod_ver_cd = #{prodVerCd} AND pi.lot_no = #{lotNo} ) src ON (ws.prod_inbo_cd = src.prod_inbo_cd AND ws.ware_area_cd = src.ware_area_cd) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET qty = qty + src.move_qty WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( wslcode, prod_inbo_cd, ware_area_cd, qty, regi, inbo_dt, unit, item_type ) VALUES ( 'WStock-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(( SELECT NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(wslcode, -3)), 0) + 1 FROM ware_stock WHERE wslcode LIKE 'WStock-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || '-%' ), 3, '0'), src.prod_inbo_cd, src.ware_area_cd, src.move_qty, src.mname, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{unit}, #{itemType} )

mapper.select: SELECT wd.vol as max_volume, COALESCE(SUM(ws.qty), 0) as current_volume, CASE WHEN (wd.vol - COALESCE(SUM(ws.qty), 0)) >= #{moveQty} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as is_valid FROM ware_d wd LEFT JOIN ware_stock ws ON wd.ware_area_cd = ws.ware_area_cd WHERE wd.ware_area_cd = #{wareAreaCd} GROUP BY wd.ware_area_cd, wd.vol
SELECT emp_cd, emp_name, dept_name, position, phone, email FROM employee WHERE emp_cd = #{empCd}

SELECT m.mcode, m.mate_ver_cd, m.mate_name, m.mate_type, m.sto_con, m.unit, m.std, m.piece_unit, m.conver_qty, m.moqty, m.safe_stock, m.edate, m.corigin, m.is_used FROM material m WHERE m.mcode = #{mcode} AND m.mate_ver_cd = #{mateVerCd} AND m.is_used = 'f1'

SELECT p.pcode, p.prod_ver_cd, p.prod_name, p.prod_type, p.unit, p.std, p.piece_unit, p.conver_qty, p.safestock, p.edate, p.is_used FROM product p WHERE p.pcode = #{pcode} AND p.prod_ver_cd = #{prodVerCd} AND p.is_used = 'f1'

SELECT w.wcode, w.ware_ver_cd, w.ware_name, w.ware_type, w.address, w.max_row, w.max_col, w.max_floor, w.fcode, w.fac_ver_cd, f.fac_name FROM warehouse w INNER JOIN factory f ON w.fcode = f.fcode AND w.fac_ver_cd = f.fac_ver_cd WHERE w.wcode = #{wcode} AND w.ware_ver_cd = #{wareVerCd} AND w.is_used = 'f1'

SELECT wd.ware_area_cd, wd.area_row, wd.area_col, wd.area_floor, wd.vol, wd.wcode, wd.ware_ver_cd, w.ware_name, f.fac_name, COALESCE(stock_sum.current_volume, 0) as current_volume FROM ware_d wd INNER JOIN warehouse w ON wd.wcode = w.wcode AND wd.ware_ver_cd = w.ware_ver_cd INNER JOIN factory f ON w.fcode = f.fcode AND w.fac_ver_cd = f.fac_ver_cd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ware_area_cd, SUM(qty) as current_volume FROM ware_stock GROUP BY ware_area_cd ) stock_sum ON wd.ware_area_cd = stock_sum.ware_area_cd WHERE wd.ware_area_cd = #{wareAreaCd}
SELECT move_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM move_req GROUP BY move_status
SELECT TO_CHAR(req_dt, 'MM') as month, COUNT(*) as count FROM move_req WHERE TO_CHAR(req_dt, 'YYYY') = #{year} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(req_dt, 'MM') ORDER BY month

SELECT mrd.move_req_cd, mrd.mcode, m.mate_name, mrd.lot_no, mrd.move_qty, mrd.item_type, mrd.unit, mrd.depa_area_cd, mrd.arr_area_cd, mr.move_status, f.fac_name, w.ware_name, wd_arr.ware_area_cd FROM move_req_d mrd INNER JOIN move_req mr ON mrd.move_req_cd = mr.move_req_cd LEFT JOIN material m ON mrd.mcode = m.mcode AND mrd.mate_ver_cd = m.mate_ver_cd LEFT JOIN ware_d wd_arr ON mrd.arr_area_cd = wd_arr.ware_area_cd LEFT JOIN warehouse w ON wd_arr.wcode = w.wcode AND wd_arr.ware_ver_cd = w.ware_ver_cd LEFT JOIN factory f ON w.fcode = f.fcode AND w.fac_ver_cd = f.fac_ver_cd WHERE mr.move_status = 'd1' AND mrd.arr_area_cd IS NOT NULL ORDER BY mr.req_dt DESC, mrd.move_req_cd
